medical_history.chief_complaint: Intermittent diarrhea associated with abdominal pain for 7 years.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 7 years ago with intermittent diarrhea and abdominal pain. Two years after onset, the patient was diagnosed with Whipple's disease but exhibited no improvement after treatment with sulfamethoxazole and trimethoprim. Recently admitted for repeated endoscopy due to ongoing symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diagnosis of Whipple's disease two years after onset of symptoms; treated without improvement.
medical_history.family_history: Two first-degree relatives with similar diagnoses of Whipple's disease and endoscopic findings.
